name: The Sunday of a Carpenter肖林朋作品
intro:
The Sunday of a Carpenter（木匠的星期天）

演唱：Royce
作词：Royce
作曲：肖林朋，Royce
编曲：肖林朋
混音：肖林朋
钢琴：王欣 原声bass：杨若彤
小号：孙翔 萨克斯：肖林朋
鼓：肖林朋

You never know how much I love my chair
You never know how much I love my bed
You never know how much I love my closet
Because I made them all myself…

You never know how much I love my log of wood
Surely I love my dog, he‘s cool
But mostly and deeply I love my girl
Because she loves me as a carpenter

Monday for a carpenter is not an easy game
Tuesday Wedndesday more or less the same
Thursday I begin to plan my Saturday
Friday I work only half the way

You know what the carpenter do on Sunday?
You guess what the carpenter do on Sunday?
The carpenter spend the whole day with his girl
In the lovely huts with Chair, bed and closet …

Dadadadadudududududu…
